org.bytedeco.arrow_dataset

Class FileSystemDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.arrow_dataset.Dataset
        • org.bytedeco.arrow_dataset.FileSystemDataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    @Namespace(value="arrow::dataset")
 @NoOffset
 @Properties(inherit=arrow_dataset.class)
public class FileSystemDataset
extends Dataset
    \brief A Dataset of FileFragments. A FileSystemDataset is composed of one or more FileFragment. The fragments are independent and don't need to share the same format and/or filesystem.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • Make

        @ByVal
public static FileSystemDatasetResult Make(@SharedPtr @ByVal
                                                   Schema schema,
                                                   @ByVal
                                                   Expression root_partition,
                                                   @SharedPtr
                                                   FileFormat format,
                                                   @SharedPtr
                                                   FileSystem filesystem,
                                                   @ByVal
                                                   FileFragmentVector fragments)
        \brief Create a FileSystemDataset.
        Parameters:
        schema - [in] the schema of the dataset
        root_partition - [in] the partition expression of the dataset
        format - [in] the format of each FileFragment.
        filesystem - [in] the filesystem of each FileFragment, or nullptr if the fragments wrap buffers.
        fragments - [in] list of fragments to create the dataset from. Note that fragments wrapping files resident in differing filesystems are not permitted; to work with multiple filesystems use a UnionDataset.
        Returns:
        A constructed dataset.
